title: The Appetizer No. 4 Recipe
full_text:
The Appetizer No. 4 Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
bourbon
1/2
teaspoon
Cointreau
3
dashes
Peychaud's bitters
Lemon twist
, for garnish
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well until chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass; twist lemon peel over the drink and use as garnish.
Special Equipment
mixing glass, bar spoon, strainer
Whiskey
